analysis.description:
Play0x_LottoBall.sendFunds (/unique_chucks/14/0x37b04116e8e6e77d985c7437e3503a752b0b0cdf.sol#872-883) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- beneficiary.send(amount) (/unique_chucks/14/0x37b04116e8e6e77d985c7437e3503a752b0b0cdf.sol#874-883)

Reentrancy in Play0x_LottoBall.settleBet (/unique_chucks/14/0x37b04116e8e6e77d985c7437e3503a752b0b0cdf.sol#499-611):
	External calls:
	- (totalAmount,totalTokenAmount,totalJackpotWin) = runRotateTime(combinationParameter,_entropy,keccak256()(abi.encodePacked(uint256(_entropy),combinationParameter[uint8(SettleParam.LuckySeed)]))) (/unique_chucks/14/0x37b04116e8e6e77d985c7437e3503a752b0b0cdf.sol#535-541)
	- ERC20(ERC20ContractAddres).balanceOf(address(this)) > 0 (/unique_chucks/14/0x37b04116e8e6e77d985c7437e3503a752b0b0cdf.sol#576-583)
	- ERC20(ERC20ContractAddres).transfer(bet.gambler,totalTokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/14/0x37b04116e8e6e77d985c7437e3503a752b0b0cdf.sol#577-582)
	- ERC20(ERC20ContractAddres).balanceOf(address(this)) > 0 (/unique_chucks/14/0x37b04116e8e6e77d985c7437e3503a752b0b0cdf.sol#585-592)
	- ERC20(ERC20ContractAddres).transfer(bet.gambler,totalAmount) (/unique_chucks/14/0x37b04116e8e6e77d985c7437e3503a752b0b0cdf.sol#586-589)
	External calls sending eth:
	- sendFunds(bet.gambler,totalAmount,totalAmount) (/unique_chucks/14/0x37b04116e8e6e77d985c7437e3503a752b0b0cdf.sol#574-575)
